### Color.GetInvertedColor method
</br>


#### Gets a contrasting color (black or white) based on luminance for readability.

```csharp
public Color GetInvertedColor()
```

### Return Value

[`White`](./White.md) or [`Black`](./Black.md) depending on brightness.
